original_text: That is how Mephibosheth came to live in Jerusalem. He could always eat his meals at the king's table. He had two weak feet, so he could not walk properly.
korean_text: 므비보셋이 항상 왕의 상에서 먹으므로 예루살렘에 사니라 그는 두 발을 다 절더라

sentences.original_text: That is how Mephibosheth came to live in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 므비보셋이 예루살렘에 살게 된 방법입니다

sentences.original_text: He could always eat his meals at the king's table
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 언제나 왕의 식탁에서 식사할 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: so he could not walk properly
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 제대로 걸을 수 없었습니다
